name: A hideous looking golden mask
data: It decreases the users strength somewhat.
It decreases the users constitution somewhat.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (poor in general).
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
It allows the user to sometimes 'disrupt' nearby magical fields.
